name: gitbook-plugin-favicon-absolute
description: favicon-absolute 插件采用绝对路径设置网站 favicon 图标,相对于相对路径来说更加简单方便.

adsense.description: 谷歌广告meta标签 <meta name='google-adsense-account' content='ca-pub-7787441319194104'>

bookmark.title: 收藏夹图标
bookmark.description: 网页被收藏时显示图标
